sentences: Ellen Benediktson (born 25 April 1995 in Limhamn) is a Swedish singer and songwriter best known for taking part in Melodifestivalen 2014, 2015 and 2020.
In 2013, Benediktson first garnered attention when she was the stand-in singer during the rehearsals for the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 singing France's entry "L'enfer et moi".
The next year, she took part in Melodifestivalen 2014 with the song "Songbird".

In April 2014, Benediktson released the song "When the Sun Comes Up" as a part of a compilation album associated with the Swedish feminist political party Feminist Initiative, she is also a supporter of the left-wing party.
She competed in Melodifestivalen 2015 with the song "Insomnia".
She competed in Melodifestivalen 2020 alongside Simon Peyron with the song, "Surface".
